--CONSULTAR EL ARCHIVO calendar.csv
USE electric_vehicle_explorer;
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE location_data_bronze
WITH( 
    LOCATION = 'abfss://electric-vehicle-data@entixcoviddl.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/'
);

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'location.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'location_data_bronze',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ';',
    FIELDQUOTE = '\',       --marca el inicio y fin de un campo de texto
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
) AS location;


--tipo de datos y largos asignados por Synapse
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''location.csv'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''location_data_bronze'',
    FORMAT = ''CSV'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '';'',
    FIELDQUOTE = ''\'', 
    ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
) AS location;'


--cambia, para efectos de consulta, el tipo y largo de datos. Tambien asigna en numero de columna a la que hace referencia en el archivo
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'location.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'location_data_bronze',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ';',
    FIELDQUOTE = '\',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
) WITH(
        locationId              INT 1,
        county                  VARCHAR(100) 2,
        city                    VARCHAR(100) 3,
        state                   VARCHAR(10) 4,
        postalCode              INT 5,
        legislativeDistrict     INT 6,
        censusTract             BIGINT 7
)AS location;
